name: geoip2-ipv4
title: GeoIP2 - free IP geolocation database as of apr 21,2015. This dataset includes GeoLite2 data created by MaxMind, available from www.maxmind.com

fields.name: network
fields.description: This is the IPv4 network in CIDR format such as 2.21.92.0/29.

fields.name: geoname_id
fields.description: A unique identifier for the networkâ€™s location as specified by GeoNames.

fields.name: continent_code
fields.description: The continent code for this IP. Possible codes are: AF - Africa, AS - Asia, EU - Europe, NA - North America, OC - Oceania, SA - South America

fields.name: continent_name
fields.description: The continent name for this location

fields.name: country_iso_code
fields.description: A two-character ISO 3166-1 country code for the country associated with the location.

fields.name: country_name
fields.description: The country name for this location.

fields.name: is_anonymous_proxy
fields.description: A 1 if the network is an anonymous proxy, otherwise 0.

fields.name: is_satellite_provider
fields.description: A 1 if the network is for a satellite provider that provides service to multiple countries, otherwise 0.
